paramInformation.label: Device Orientation
paramInformation.description: Orientation in relation to default position.

paramInformation.label: Buzzer - acoustic signal settings
paramInformation.description: Acoustic signalling of gestures detection.

paramInformation.label: LED diode - visual indicator settings
paramInformation.description: Visual indication of gestures detection

paramInformation.label: Buzzer - signalling result of gesture recognition
paramInformation.description: Acoustic signalling of gesture recognition result (using the built-in buzzer).

options.label: Successful and failed recognition is signalled

paramInformation.label: Powering mode update interval
paramInformation.description: Check if the USB pwr supply is connected, update pwr mode

paramInformation.label: Power saving mode (battery mode)
paramInformation.description: This parameter determines operation of gesture detection when battery powered.

options.label: Swipe does not enter power saving mode

paramInformation.label: Hold gesture to enter the menu
paramInformation.description: Choose if the menu can be entered using the Hold gesture.

options.label: Hold gesture to enter the menu enabled
Hold gesture to enter the menu disabled

paramInformation.label: Scenes sent to the controller
paramInformation.description: Defines which actions result in sending scenes to 1st “Lifeline” group.

options.label: Scenes for flick UP gesture enabled
Scenes for flick DOWN gesture enabled
Scenes for flick LEFT gesture enabled
Scenes for flick RIGHT gesture enabled
Scenes for clockwise circular gesture enabled
Scenes for CCW circular gesture enabled

paramInformation.label: Associations in Z-Wave network security mode
paramInformation.description: Define sent command for specified association groups.

paramInformation.label: Mode of 2nd-5th "Flick UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT”
paramInformation.description: Choose control mode for 2nd-5th groups and scenes.

options.label: Toggle Mode enabled for 2nd association group
Toggle Mode enabled for 3rd association group
Toggle Mode enabled for 4th association group
Toggle Mode enabled for 5th association group

paramInformation.label: Rate of smooth level control
paramInformation.description: Choose gesture time for "AirWheel" to reach max/min level.

paramInformation.label: SWITCH ON control frame value for FLICK UP gesture
paramInformation.description: Value sent in SWITCH ON command

paramInformation.label: SWITCH OFF frame value for FLICK UP
paramInformation.description: Value sent in SWITCH OFF command frame.

paramInformation.description: Value sent in SWITCH ON command frame.

paramInformation.label: SWITCH OFF frame value for FLICK DOWN
paramInformation.description: Value sent in SWITCH OFF command frame.

paramInformation.description: Value sent in SWITCH ON command frame.

paramInformation.label: SWITCH OFF frame value for FLICK LEFT
paramInformation.description: Value sent in SWITCH OFF command frame.

paramInformation.label: SWITCH ON frame value for FLICK RIGHT
paramInformation.description: Value sent in SWITCH ON command frame.

paramInformation.label: SWITCH OFF frame value for FLICK RIGHT
paramInformation.description: Value sent in SWITCH OFF command frame.

paramInformation.description: Value containing sequence of gestures.
